dashboard.title: Your Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Track your contribution to campus sustainability

organizer.actionRequiredText: You have {{count}} pending pickup confirmations. Students are waiting to collect their food!
organizer.emptyListings: You have no active food listings. Click "Add Food" to help reduce food waste!

redeemModal.title: Redeem Cashback Points
redeemModal.description: Convert your volunteer points into canteen discounts.
redeemModal.errorRange: Please enter a value between 50 and {{maxPoints}}.

student.emptyRequests: Ready to start your food saving journey?

browseFood.title: Available Surplus Food
browseFood.subtitle: Find and claim fresh meals from around campus. Act fast before they expire!

emptyState.title: No food items found
emptyState.checkBack: Check back later for new listings!

addFood.title: List Surplus Food
addFood.subtitle: Help reduce food waste by sharing your surplus food with others

ai.description: Let our AI analyze your food photo and details to suggest an optimal title and expiry time.

errors.noImage: Please upload an image for the food listing.
errors.aiFail: Sorry, the AI analysis failed. Please check the details and try again, or set the fields manually.
errors.addFail: Failed to add food listing. Please check the details and try again.
errors.uploadFail: Failed to upload image or create listing. Please try again.

subtitles.organizer: Transform your surplus food into community impact. List your excess inventory and help reduce waste while feeding those in need.
subtitles.student: Discover fresh, affordable meals from campus canteens and events. Never let good food go to waste while satisfying your hunger.
subtitles.ngo: Connect with surplus food sources to support your community programs. Help bridge the gap between food waste and food security.
subtitles.default: Join our mission to eliminate food waste on campus. Whether you're sharing surplus or finding your next meal, every action counts.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to make a difference in your community

steps.discoverDesc: Browse real-time listings of surplus food from campus canteens, events, and dining halls with detailed information and pickup times.
steps.claimDesc: Reserve your portion instantly with our smart booking system. Get confirmation and pickup details delivered to your phone.
steps.collectDesc: Visit the pickup location within your time window and enjoy fresh, quality food while contributing to sustainability.

features.title: Why Choose ZeroBite?
features.subtitle: Built for the modern campus community with sustainability in mind

cards.qualityDesc: All listed food items are fresh and safe, with clear expiry times and quality standards maintained.
cards.impactDesc: Reduce food waste by up to 95% and contribute to a more sustainable campus ecosystem.
cards.communityDesc: Connect with fellow students, staff, and local organizations to build a stronger community network.

finalCta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
finalCta.description: Join thousands of students and organizations already making an impact on campus

analyticsPage.title: Your Detailed Analytics
analyticsPage.subtitle: An overview of your food redistribution efforts and impact.
